In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ser Gerold Hightower was known as "the White Bull" for his immense strength. He was Lord Commander of the Kingsguard during the brief reign of King Jaehaerys II and then under King Aerys II.

Gerold Hightower, similarly to [[Barristan Selmy]] and [[Arthur Dayne]], was blindly loyal to the Mad King, no matter how cruel and bloodthirsty Aerys was. He is present when Aerys [[Execution of Rickard and Brandon Stark|executes]] [[Rickard Stark]] and [[Brandon Stark (Son of Rickard)|his son]]. He notices that [[Jaime Lannister]] disapproves of the unjust atrocity and tells him "You swore a vow to guard the king, not to judge him".
